sources.title: Dear Murderer
sources.description: Title: Dear Murderer Summary: When successful business man Lee Warren suspects his wife is having an affair, he sets out find her lover, kill him, and make it look like suicide. Complications set in, when he finds out ... Directed by: Arthur Crabtree Actors: Eric Portman, Greta Gynt, Dennis Price Production Company: Gainsborough Pictures Release Date: 23 June 1947 (UK) Aspect Ratio: 1.37 : 1 When successful business man Lee Warren suspects his wife is having an affair, he sets out find her lover, kill him, and make it look like suicide. Complications set in, when he finds out she has another lover as well, so Lee has to change his plans.

metadata.Plot: When successful business man Lee Warren suspects his wife is having an affair, he sets out find her lover, kill him, and make it look like suicide. Complications set in after he finds out she has another lover as well, so Lee has to change his plans.
metadata.Writer: Muriel Box, Sydney Box, Peter Rogers
metadata.Actors: Eric Portman, Greta Gynt, Dennis Price
